## log() function

Constructs a log scale from the input domain, mapping to an output range of \[0, 1\]. Effectively behaves like d3-scale/scaleLog with less exposed functionality such as chaining

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function log(domain: number[], clamp?: boolean): (value: number) => number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  domain | number\[\] | the input domain |
|  clamp | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

(value: number) =&gt; number
